Splash Of Fun With 3D Balancing Blocks

Location: Australia,
Date: 3/17/2025
Application: playground

Project Overview

These fantastic TPV frogs bring a splash of fun to a playground in Australia, creatively showcasing the stages of a frog’s life cycle. Designed as imaginative balancing blocks, they’re coated in Rosehill TPV®, providing a cushioned, grippy surface that enhances both safety and play.Our rubber wetpour opens up endless design possibilities, from simple shapes to intricate animal sculptures. With 21 vibrant colours to choose from, it’s easy to create engaging playground features, interactive floor games, and striking 3D elements—bringing imaginative play to life in the safest way possible.Thanks to <a href="https://rubberworx.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rubberworx</a> and <a href="https://www.surfacedesigns.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Surface Designs TPV</a>

Ready to Transform Your Space?

Contact us today to discuss how Rosehill TPV® can create safe, vibrant surfaces for your project.
